92.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

349.movie_name: Return of the Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The (1994)

144.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

280.movie_plot: The puppets return and hunt paranormal researchers in an attempt to take their brain fluid for their master, Andre Toulon.

22.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

148.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

346.movie_name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers (1989)

273.movie_plot: Several people are hunted by a cruel serial killer who kills his victims in their dreams. While the survivors are trying to find the reason for being chosen, the murderer won't lose any chance to kill them as soon as they fall asleep.

103.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

310.movie_plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

18.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

19.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

123.movie_plot: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

268.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

347.movie_name: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995)

232.movie_plot: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

254.movie_plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

47.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

5.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

309.movie_plot: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

351.movie_plot: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

128.movie_plot: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

27.movie_plot: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

187.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

102.movie_plot: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

42.movie_plot: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

157.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

260.movie_plot: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

246.movie_plot: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

65.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

111.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

295.movie_plot: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

143.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

336.movie_plot: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

13.movie_plot: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

343.movie_plot: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

126.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

316.movie_plot: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

203.movie_plot: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

270.movie_plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

82.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

288.movie_plot: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

299.movie_plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

339.movie_plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

48.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

342.movie_name: Adventures of Milo and Otis, The (1986)

356.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child, A (1989)
356.movie_plot: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.
